name: Russell Westbrook
description: 6'3" point guard, known for his explosive athleticism, triple-double prowess, and relentless intensity. Powerful build, signature scowl.

triple-threat-stance.name: Triple Threat Stance
triple-threat-stance.description: A low, ready stance with the ball, ready to drive, pass, or shoot.
triple-threat-stance.expression: intense focus, coiled and ready to explode
triple-threat-stance.prompt: Russell Westbrook in a low, athletic triple threat stance - knees bent, ball held ready in front, eyes laser-focused and scanning the court, shoulders squared to the basket, ready to attack at any moment, coiled spring energy

driving-layup.name: Driving Layup
driving-layup.description: Full speed drive to the basket, finishing with a high-flying layup.
driving-layup.prompt: Russell Westbrook driving to the basket at full speed for a layup - ball high in right hand, body parallel to the baseline, legs pumping, defender trailing, eyes locked on the rim, powerful leap toward the basket, aggressive and determined expression

chest-pound.name: Chest Pound Celebration
chest-pound.description: Pounding his chest after a big play.
chest-pound.prompt: Russell Westbrook pounding his chest after a clutch play - face contorted in a roar, veins bulging, fist hammering his chest with force, body coiled and releasing energy, teammates reacting in the background, pure unadulterated passion

stepback-jumper.name: Stepback Jumper
stepback-jumper.description: Creating space with a quick stepback and rising for a jumper.
stepback-jumper.prompt: Russell Westbrook executing a stepback jumper - ball released at the apex of the jump, body leaning back slightly, feet planted wide, defender behind him, eyes locked on the basket with unwavering focus, a confident swagger in his posture

pointing-celebration.name: Pointing Celebration
pointing-celebration.description: Pointing at a teammate after an assist or big play
pointing-celebration.prompt: Russell Westbrook emphatically pointing at a teammate - after a successful assist or game-changing play, face showing intense pride and excitement, finger extended accusingly toward teammate, energy palpable between them, a gesture of respect and acknowledgment, full of emotion.
